paragraphs.text: Request to become an affiliate or partner via email

paragraphs.body: Avatar Wiki warmly welcomes any site owners who wish to affiliate with us. The extent of the partnership your site has with Avatar Wiki is entirely up to you, and we will answer request emails very quickly. All we ask for as a minimum in return is a (findable) link from your site to our main page.
paragraphs.text: Avatar Wiki warmly welcomes any site owners who wish to affiliate with us. The extent of the partnership your site has with Avatar Wiki is entirely up to you, and we will answer request emails very quickly. All we ask for as a minimum in return is a (findable) link from your site to our main page.

paragraphs.body: Options that we will honor by default include a dedicated article about your site, and a prominent link to your site. A link to your website will also be added to ${link_0}, which is linked from our dropdown menu. There are more options in partnership available: all you have to do is ask.
paragraphs.text: Options that we will honor by default include a dedicated article about your site, and a prominent link to your site. A link to your website will also be added to our list of external sites, which is linked from our dropdown menu. There are more options in partnership available: all you have to do is ask.

paragraphs.body: You can request to partner with Avatar Wiki by clicking the button at the top right (or ${link_0}). You should receive a quick response from bureaucrat The 888th Avatar. If you're specifically wanting to affiliate with our fanon or forum portals, please make note of that within the email.
